other_title: エルフを狩るモノたち II (Japanese)
plot: After Junpei botched the second attempt to transport back to Japan, the four embark their journey once again to collect runes imprinted on skin of Elven females by stripping them. Celsia is cursed into the form of another animal this time.
ending_theme: "To a Place Beyond Miracles" by Naoko Hamasaki
